inclusion.criterion: MRI for focal epilepsy at the Johns Hopkins Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to undergo an additional MRI exam in the 7T scanner at Kennedy Krieger Institute

exclusion.criterion: History of Metal in the Skull/Eyes

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He is presenting with facial twitching and generalized shaking.
